p: The changes in cellular morphology of MCF-7, A-549, and HeLa cells are shown in Figure 5. As shown in the figure, obvious morphological changes were observed at 24 h treatment with AG-ME at 1000 μg/ml. Compared to untreated control, the MCF-7, A-549, and HeLa cells exposed to AG-ME at 1000 μg/ml lost their original shape, become less in number, rounded, and shrunken with apoptotic bodies ( Figure 5).
